issue.title: [Java] Make IPC option immutable
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11081](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11081). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
By making it immutable, the following benefits can be obtained:
1. It makes the code easier to reason about.
2. It allows JIT to make more optimizations.
3. Immutable objects can be shared, so many object allocations can be avoided.
